findings.title: Weak PRNG
findings.description: Do not use block.timestamp as source randomness as this can be manipulated by miners.

findings.title: Return Value of External Transfer/TransferFrom Not Checked
findings.description: The return value of an external transfer or transferFrom function is not checked, which can lead to potential issues.

findings.title: Calls to a function sending BNB to an arbitrary address
findings.description: The function swapAndSendToFee sends BNB to an arbitrary address, specifically _marketingWalletAddress.
